response.overview: "Existential Zombies: Michelangelo Antonioni's L'Eclisse" is a 2019 short documentary directed by Alexandre O. Philippe. The film features insights from editor Chris Innis and filmmakers Aaron Moorhead and Justin Benson, who analyze how Antonioni sets the scene in his 1962 classic, "L'Eclisse."
response.title: Existential Zombies: Michelangelo Antonioni's L'Eclisse
